game.name: Airplane Free Fly Simulator
game.description:
It is to time to try out something really challenging and make your country feel proud on you! Wow! You are a captain and assigned to complete some important missions via your aeroplane in this free HTML5 flying challenge. Would you think that your ultimate pilot skills can lead you towards accomplishing the job on time? Join Airplane Free Fly Simulator and show off the world and be prepared to complete multiple tasks right from flying an airplane to becoming the best flight pilot!

Your objective in this brand new aeroplane game is to take off the chosen jet high into the blue sky and help it to land at the designated locations. Hurry up guys! Your passengers are waiting for you so try to be fast to pick and drop them on time. Do not underestimate yourself as you are a professional pilot who is skilled enough to steer the airplane through the sky! Make sure to use the map properly to complete taxiing at the marked airplane parking area.

Pick up the team and drop them before your fuel runs out in this cool aeroplane simulator! Complete the assigned task by following the checkpoints that you can also figure out with the help of the map shown on the top left corner of the screen! Play this airplane simulator game online without download to become a professional pilot! Do not forget to browse through our extensive collection of free flying games to find some more engaging and addictive games for free

game.webControlKeys: W,UP ARROW-TAKE OFF(TO FLY DOWN),S DOWN ARROW-FLY UP,A,D L-R ARROW TO L-R, F TO FLOATING
